promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic epic ladybug dark-type with violet hypnotic wings. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or ladybug. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Violetium, a gigantic epic ladybug dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Hangry Spike. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word ladybug or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, ladybug-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Violetium scours castle walls for foes to wear down. Its Hangry Spike can fend off any foe. Imposing and formidable, no enemy dares approach.
